history.taskDescription: Your task is to measure the melting point of tin, which is located around the kitchen. First, focus on the thermometer. Next, focus on the tin. If the melting point of tin is above 50.0 degrees celsius, focus on the red box. If the melting point of tin is below 50.0 degrees celsius, focus on the green box. The boxes are located around the kitchen.
